docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; Miami Marlins acquisitions Rafael Furcal and Casey McGehee, who both missed the entire 2013 major league season, appreciate the opportunities in freont of them, albeit on a team made up primarily of youth; veterans Furcal and McGehee will play second and third base, respectively.

docs.snippet: The first two volumes of the Library of America’s three-volume collection of Bernard Malamud’s work include 36 stories, six of which Malamud himself never saw in print, and five novels....
docs.lead_paragraph: The first two volumes of the Library of America’s three-volume collection of Bernard Malamud’s work include 36 stories, six of which Malamud himself never saw in print, and five novels.
docs.abstract: Cynthia Ozick reviews books Bernard Malamud: Novels and Stories of the 1940s and 50s: 'The Natural,' 'The Assistant,' 'Twenty Stories,' 'Posthumously Published Stories' and Bernard Malamud: Novels and Stories of the 1960s: 'A New Life,' 'The Fixer,' 'Pictures of Fidelman: An Exhibition,' 'Ten Stories,' both edited by Philip Davis.

headline.seo: Library of America’s Bernard Malamud Collections
